# Standing Offer - Carpentry Services (Nappan Research Farm)

## Tender Details

### Notice Information

* Title: Standing Offer - Carpentry Services (Nappan)
* Reference Number: PW-22-01012984
* Solicitation Number: 01B46-2022-098
* Tender Closing Date: December 15, 2022, at 14:00 EST (EST)
* Publication Date: November 9, 2022

### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Construction and Services
* Trade Agreements: The solicitation for this project is covered by the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: Nova Scotia

### Contract Requirements

* Location: 4016 Highway 302, Nappan, Nova Scotia, B0L 1C0 (located on the Nappan Research Farm)
* Description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires a contractor to provide carpentry services, such as installation, removal, and repair of various building components, including roofing, windows, doors, siding, and interior structural and mechanical components on an as-and-when-requested basis.

### Special Conditions

* Mandatory attendance at site visit: It is recommended that the bidder or a representative of the bidder attend a site visit to familiarize themselves with the project details. The site visit will take place on November 23, 2022, at the Nappan Research Farm.
* Information requests and inquiries: Bidders who contact anyone other than the identified AAFC contract officer to obtain information during the solicitation period may be disqualified.

### Service Provider Information

* Service Provider: Buy and Sell
* Documents: These documents are available on the Buy and Sell service provider platform.

### Contract Officer

* Name: Jean-Francois Lemay
* Position: Contract Officer
* Organization: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
